Adam Zsolt Wagner / @azwagner_:
Researchers tested Google DeepMind's AlphaEvolve AI agent on 67 mathematical problems and found that it discovered improved solutions to about 20 of them  —  Really happy to share our new paper on using AlphaEvolve for mathematical exploration at scale, written with Javier Gómez-Serrano, Terence Tao, and @GoogleDeepMind's Bogdan Georgiev. We tested it on 67 problems and documented all our successes and failures. 🧵 [image]

The console comes with 256GB of internal storage, but that probably won’t be enough room for your entire digital game library. Thankfully, however, Samsung’s 512GB […]

items.title: One of the best Black Friday 2025 deals is already live – M4 MacBook Air at $250 off (All-time low)
items.summary:
Black Friday month 2025 is off to a seriously notable start. Alongside the usual smattering of early discounts we see just about every year from select brands, the early sales have also ushered in seriously notable and all-time low pricing on major 2025 tech releases – retailers typically make folks wait for these sorts of discounts until much later in the month. Alongside the all-time low pricing on the new Google Pixel devices, one of the particularly standout offers delivers new Amazon all-time low pricing across the 2025 MacBook Air lineup. 

more…

items.title: Official Target early Black Friday sale now live – Up to 40% off apparel, 30% off Levi’s, more
items.summary:
Check out Target’s early Black Friday sale, happening now through November 8th, with up to 40% off essentials for the whole fam, pajamas, and a giant Levi’s sale. Don’t miss out, scope the entire sale here. 

more…

items.title: Target early Black Friday LEGO sale now live: Up to 40% discounts, including Advent calendars at new lows from $18
items.summary:
Target has launched its limited LEGO early Black Friday deals through November 8, giving us some significant savings on a large collection of building sets, including some of the 2025 Advent Calendars. Among the lineup, you can find sets like the 2025 LEGO Star Wars Advent Calendar at $26.99 shipped, which matches the rate at Amazon, as well as the 2025 LEGO City Advent Calendar at $17.99 shipped, which is unavailable at Amazon, but does beat out the early Black Friday deals from Best Buy. These two would normally fetch $45 and $30 were it not for the discounts, which we’ve recently seen taken to these rates for the first time, giving you 40% markdowns to new all-time low prices, saving you up to $18 off the going rate in the process. Head below for more on these and the other sets we’re seeing included in this sale.

more…

items.title: Tesla to begin Cybercab production in April, Musk claims
items.summary: Elon Musk said he expects Tesla to be able to put all the Cybercabs it builds on the road, and thanked Waymo for "paving the path."

items.title: Bring home Dyson’s V11 cordless vacuum cleaner with $170+ savings while at its $400 annual low
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the Dyson V11 Origin Cordless Vacuum at $399.99 shipped, which is not only matching in price at Dyson, but there you can also get a complimentary furniture cleaning kit (valued at $70). Normally fetching $570 at full price, discounts have mostly kept the costs above $468 over 2025, with the only previous falls lower being to this same rate during both of this year’s Prime Day events. You’re looking at another chance to score it here with a $170 markdown back at the lowest price that we have tracked this year. You can also find the standard Dyson V11 Cordless Vacuum package at the same rate, with the difference here being the included attachment tools.

more…

If you have a 2021 Tesla Model 3 or Y or later, this hub is ready to step up your charging situation in a sleek way. Where two USB-C ports are usually tucked away, this adapter slots into place to make them more accessible while also offering up two additional USB-A outputs.

items.title: Get up to 328 feet of Govee’s Christmas Lights 2 with Matter, AI-generated effects, and more starting from $70
items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, Govee is offering up to 31% discounts across the four sizes of its Christmas Lights 2 with Matter, starting with the 66-foot model at $69.99 shipped. It would normally cost you $100 at full price, with discounts having only beaten this rate once in 2025 during July’s Prime Day event, when it fell to the $64 low. Today’s deal comes in as a repeat from last month’s Prime Day, giving you a $30 markdown from the going rate for the second-lowest price we have tracked. You’ll also find the 99-foot model down at $89.99 shipped from $130, the 164-foot model at $149.99 shipped from $200, and the 328-foot model at $299.99 shipped from $400.
